title: Fatal Shooting in Langley Park Under Investigation
body:
*****Spanish Translation Follows*****The Prince George’s County Police Department’s Homicide Unit is investigating a fatal shooting that occurred Saturday night in Langley Park. The victim is 26-year-old Wuilian Montepeque Mejia. His last known address is in Los Angeles. A second man was also shot. He remains hospitalized with critical injuries.On March 27, 2021, at approximately 10:10 pm, officers responded to the 1100 block of Merrimac Drive for a reported shooting. The officers located Montepeque Mejia inside of a car suffering from gunshot wounds. He was pronounced dead on the scene. The second victim was located outside and was transported to a hospital for treatment. Detectives are working to determine a motive and identify the suspect(s) in this case. If anyone has information relevant to this investigation, they are asked to please call detectives at 301-516-2512. Callers wishing to remain anonymous may call Crime Solvers at 1-866-411-TIPS (8477), go online at www.pgcrimesolvers.com, or use the “P3 Tips” mobile app (search “P3 Tips” in the Apple Store or Google Play to download the app onto your mobile device.) Please refer to case 21-0013783.*****Spanish Translation Follows*****Bajo Investigación Mortal Tiroteo Ocurrido en Langley
